fields.desc_footer: Yup that is a smelly fridge.
fields.title: Kitchen
fields.desc_header: You've entered the Kitchen. The fridge door is slightly ajar and smells like bologni.

fields.desc_footer:
You look around the room and notice the door to the East. There's a painting on the North Wall, and a
        lighter on the floor.
fields.title: Attic
fields.desc_header:
You wake up in a dimly lit room, not entirely sure where you are or how you got there. The paint on the
        walls is cracked and peeling, yellowed stains stretching from the ceiling to the floor. There is a window to the
        South, the curtains hang tattered, light from the sunset casting shadows across the floor.
